price: [Diles ¡oh, Mujámmad!:] "Corran hacia Dios, [y sepan que] yo soy un amonestador que habla claro.
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
